## Public Member Functions

### assign() {#aca181a8107cd511dad6c6627fe9f6fae}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegMatrix::assign (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg)</>}>
Assign VirtReg to PhysReg.

This will mark VirtReg&#39;s live range as occupied in the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveregmatrix">LiveRegMatrix</a> and update <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/virtregmap">VirtRegMap</a>. The live range is expected to be available in PhysReg.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00131">131</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00111">111</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### checkInterference() {#ad064f1e4af82a7f4251434afde29b0b5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LiveRegMatrix::InterferenceKind LiveRegMatrix::checkInterference (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> for interference before assigning VirtReg to PhysReg.

If this function returns IK&#95;Free, it is legal to assign(VirtReg, PhysReg). When there is more than one kind of interference, the <a href="#ab317b81a1c575049207d5d9348d8635a">InterferenceKind</a> with the highest enum value is returned.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00108">108</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00194">194</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### checkInterference() {#ab9e855199959852351ae2761ae4302be}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRegMatrix::checkInterference (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> End, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> for interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) that may prevent assignment to PhysReg.

If this function returns true, there is interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) of some other interval already assigned to PhysReg. If this function returns false, PhysReg is free at the segment &#91;Start, End).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00116">116</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00218">218</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### checkInterferenceLanes() {#afc6ed60b40c5c63149c23ba327a77c23}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LaneBitmask LiveRegMatrix::checkInterferenceLanes (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> Start, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/slotindex">SlotIndex</a> End, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> for interference in the segment &#91;Start, End) that may prevent assignment to PhysReg, like checkInterference.

Returns a lane mask of which lanes of the physical register interfere in the segment &#91;Start, End) of some other interval already assigned to PhysReg.

If this function returns <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/lanebitmask/#a9082b6aa4021114645045d9c5628eb26">LaneBitmask::getNone()</a>, PhysReg is completely free at the segment &#91;Start, End).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00125">125</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00248">248</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### checkRegMaskInterference() {#a0afff12e511e93ff630cada967573162}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRegMatrix::checkRegMaskInterference (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; VirtReg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg=<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister/#a4aa6aac0f36c1123df3686f7b4150d2c">MCRegister::NoRegister</a>)</>}>
<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/check">Check</a> for regmask interference only.

Return true if VirtReg crosses a regmask operand that clobbers PhysReg. If PhysReg is null, check if VirtReg crosses any regmask operands.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00151">151</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00153">153</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.

### invalidateVirtRegs() {#a448841a51094959c1ca24de1ae55435f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void llvm::LiveRegMatrix::invalidateVirtRegs ()"
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Invalidate cached interference queries after modifying virtual register live ranges.

Interference checks may return stale information unless caches are invalidated.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>.

### isPhysRegUsed() {#a28429b5d6afc4dc076b94527f2cb1de8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool LiveRegMatrix::isPhysRegUsed (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregister">MCRegister</a> PhysReg) const</>}>
Returns true if the given <code>PhysReg</code> has any live intervals assigned.

### query() {#a7c79a2c92779f3c549dee89406ccdfc1}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>LiveIntervalUnion::Query &amp; LiveRegMatrix::query (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverange">LiveRange</a> &amp; LR, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8adc81fee7f9e66260dd2b626660c9c9">MCRegUnit</a> RegUnit)</>}>
Query a line of the assigned virtual register matrix directly.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcregunititerator">MCRegUnitIterator</a> to enumerate all regunits in the desired PhysReg. This returns a reference to an internal Query data structure that is only valid until the next <a href="#a7c79a2c92779f3c549dee89406ccdfc1">query()</a> call.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00164">164</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### unassign() {#a128d0b27fb99ba10fc96a8c526129157}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void LiveRegMatrix::unassign (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liveinterval">LiveInterval</a> &amp; VirtReg)</>}>
Unassign VirtReg from its PhysReg.

Assuming that VirtReg was previously assigned to a PhysReg, this undoes the assignment and updates <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/virtregmap">VirtRegMap</a> accordingly.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h/#l00136">136</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/liveregmatrix-h">LiveRegMatrix.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp/#l00128">128</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/liveregmatrix-cpp">LiveRegMatrix.cpp</a>.
